fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Steal somebody's weapon and then attack them with it. If they had tried to attack anybody, their attack will be cancelled.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you kill a member of the town using a stolen weapon, you will immediately commit suicide using it. In addition, a random evil will then find the weapon in the morning and take it, gaining one use of it.
